Pallite_TC.NAME: Pallite
Pallite_TC.FLAVOR: Media of color toning magics, very similar to a painting palette.
DESCRIPTIONS: When a #yPainted enemy dies, gain #b1 charge. Once per turn, right click on the relic to apply #yInk based on current #yTheme.

Painter_TC.NAME: Painter Wand
Painter_TC.FLAVOR: Media for casting color magics, a paintbrush.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a #yRetone to hand.

MysticPowerCell_TC.NAME: Mystic Powercell
DESCRIPTIONS: combats, gain [E] at the start of your turn.
The relic has consumed all its power.

MusicBox_TC.NAME: Music Box
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have at least #b6 cards in hand when ending your turn, gain [E] at start of next turn.

LivePaint_TC.NAME: Live Paint
LivePaint_TC.FLAVOR: Unplug and look inside, you can see it change color by itself.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your max HP by #b5. Start each combat with #b1 #yInk #yAlternate.

BigHorn_TC.NAME: Big Horn
BigHorn_TC.FLAVOR: From some even bigger creature... Rooms in the Spire seem too small for them.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you first break #yblock in a combat, gain [E] .

JointFigure_TC.NAME: Joint Figure
JointFigure_TC.FLAVOR: Little figure with very flexible joints, perfect painting model.
DESCRIPTIONS: Applying #yPainted to a #yPainted enemy makes it lose #b10 % current HP.

Tripling_TC.NAME: Tripling
Tripling_TC.FLAVOR: Three magnetic beads, everlasting group dance.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you discard #y3 cards, draw #b3 more cards next turn.

GoldenPage_TC.NAME: Golden Page
GoldenPage_TC.FLAVOR: Once upon a time, there was another great painter who visited this place...

PainterB_TC.NAME: Painter Noir
PainterB_TC.FLAVOR: Toning with black, all colors can be more vivid.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yPainter #yWand. At start of each combat, add #b3 #yRetone to hand.

PainterW_TC.NAME: Painter Albus
PainterW_TC.FLAVOR: Toning with white, all colors can be mixed in.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yPainter #yWand. When a #yPainted enemy dies, gain #b1 additional charge for #yPallite.

Antinomy_TC.NAME: Shattered Reality
Antinomy_TC.FLAVOR: You can`t even focus you eyes on it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at start of your turn. In the first turn of each combat, a random type of #yAttack / #ySkill / #yPower cards becomes temporarily #runplayable.

DreamScale_TC.NAME: Dream Scale
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b2 turns, gain #b1 Buffer and shuffle a random #rStatus card into discard pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Completely absorb the next damage to your HP.
